address.streetAddress: Flat 155/FWah Shing Center 11 Shing Yip

name: VNU Exhibitions Asia Ltd.
description: This company is a joint venture of Jaarbeurs and Keylong Exhibitions Service Co.,Ltd.. As one of the earliest exhibition companies in the country, VNU Exhibitions Asia has been a leader in China's exhibition industry for more than two decades. Through the joint efforts of more than 200 outstanding employees, the company hosts over 20 top exhibitions and conferences in China each year, with a total exhibition area of over 600,000 square meters. The company is headquartered in Shanghai.As an important member of Jaarbeurs, a 100-year-old European enterprise, VNU Exhibitions Asia has a wealth of operational experience in domestic exhibitions, and has been widely praised by industry partners for its excellent international resources and brand influence. The company is a member of Union of International Fairs (UFI) and Level A Qualification Unit of Shanghai Convention & Exhibition Industries Association (SCEIA).VNU Exhibitions Asia has founded numerous self-owned branded exhibitions with international influence, including Pet Fair Asia, Shanghai International Money Fair, Shanghai World Travel Fair, International Building Industrialization of Construction Exhibition Asia, and HORTI CHINA. Meanwhile, the company has introduced and extensively grown a series of world-renowned branded exhibitions to the Chinese market, such as DOMOTEX asia/CHINAFLOOR , R+T Asia, TCT Asia, Salone del Mobile.Milano Shanghai, and VIV China. Over the past 20 years, VNU Exhibitions Asia has gradually formed its unique characteristics – “glocalization for both local and international projects”. Currently the company has the largest number of self-owned branded exhibitions, and introduced the most international branded exhibitions in China.In order to meet the development needs of the rapid industry transformation under the new economic situation, VNU Exhibitions Asia will adopt a comprehensive strategic plan for its group development and global deployment. In the future, the company will be driven by information technologies and innovation, continue to take advantage of its ability to integrate resources, and further explore the core fields within the four major sections of construction, lifestyle, agriculture and industry. Innovative business such as conferences and media will be launched and added to the company portfolio too. VNU Exhibitions Asia will strive to create a new China model leading the global exhibition industry.

name: Conference and Exhibition Management Services Pvt Ltd
description: Established since 1980 CEMS is a regional organiser with a global perspective. A key player in the Meetings Incentives Conventions and Exhibitions (MICE) industry in Singapore CEMS has vast knowledge and experience in organising and managing exhibitions and conferences for government agencies associations and private enterprises.Our business activities span many countries in South East Asia including Singapore Thailand and Vietnam as well as other Asia countries like China India and Pakistan.Amongst others our portfolio of exhibitions includes the Glasstech Asia the second largest specialized glass exhibition in Asia Pacific IGATEX Pakistan one of the most established exhibitions for the textile and garment industry in the world as well as Beijing International Tourism Expo and China Guilin International Tourism Expo which are the key tourism events in China. On a local front CEMS owns and organises several key exhibitions such as Safety & Security Asia the largest security exhibition widely recognized as the gateway to South East Asia market Singapore International Jewellery Show as well as Enviro Asia.In terms of conferences CEMS has acted as a Professional Conference Organiser (PCO) for several trade associations and medical societies in managing their regional and international meetings and congresses. Amongst them were the 24th Convention of the Institute of Brewing 26th Congress of the International Society of Hematology Water Environmental Federation (WEF) Technical Conference Human Resource Development Conference 35th General Association of International Sports Federations (GAISF) Congress and 25th International Congress of Applied Psychology etc.For the past two decades CEMS had formed strategic partnerships with both local and international organisations to achieve mutually desirable goals in the MICE industry. This had included collaboration with Certis CISCO Singapore Glass Association and Singapore International Jewellery Pte Ltd in Singapore; as well as Messe Munich and Nürnberg Global Fairs and Leipziger Messe International of Germany. CEMS continues to seek new strategic alliances with interested parties.In all CEMS has been involved in more than 200 major conventions and exhibitions in the Asia Pacific region since 1980.

More than 800 talented individuals collaborate to present market leading events for sectors including Beauty Construction Design Life Sciences Maritime Nutraceuticals Pop Culture and Real Estate. Through face to face and digital channels Informa Exhibitions enables communities to engage experience and do business.

address.streetAddress: 8/F & 7/F Room 01, 02, 07, 08, Urban Development Tower, 355 Hongqiao Rd, Xuhui Qu

name: Guangzhou Lisheng Exhibition Co.Ltd.
description: Guangzhou Lisheng Exhibition Co.,Ltd., established in 2003, is one of the professional exhibition companies supported by the government. After several years’ development, Guangzhou Lisheng Exhibition Co.,Ltd. has been awarded as the member of China Fire Protection Association, China International Chamber - Guangdong Chamber, China Safety Industry Association, China Council for the Promotion of International Trade Guangdong Committee, China Association of Work Safety, Guangzhou Industry Association of Emergency Management, Guangzhou Exhibition Industry Association, Yunnan Fire Protection Association and Guangdong Household Electrical Appliances Chamber, etc.We have successfully operated many projects, such as China (Guangzhou) International Emergency Safety Expo, China (Guangzhou) International Fire Safety Expo, China (Guangzhou) International Safety and Health Expo, China (Kunming) Southeast Asia & South Asia Fire Safety and Emergency Rescue Technology Expo, China(Shanghai) International Emergency & Fire Safety Expo (CEFE Powered by INTERSCHUTZ), Emergency & Safety Technology Exhibition of China Hi-Tech Fair, etc. We are engaged in the development of fire safety and emergency industry with wealth of experience and sources. We aim to create a comprehensive platform for the matching of Online E-Commerce, Offline Exhibition and financial services.

address.streetAddress: Room 2312, Building C, The Hub, XinGang East Road, Haizhu District, Guangzhou

name: Shanghai Yihan Exhibition Service Co Ltd
description: Established in the year 2002, the Shanghai Yihan Exhibition Service Co Ltd is an organization that has earned a reputation for itself in the field of events services by organization many high profile events and exhibitions for a wide range of industry sectors. All the major activities of this company are centralized in its head office that is located in Shanghai, China. The main forte of this company is the successful organization of the China International Exhibition on Surfactant and Detergent or the IESD China, which is a globally renowned exhibition related to the detergent and surfactant industries. This company has a special expertise in having organized with impeccable precision many editions of the IESD, an event that is also expecting its forthcoming edition very soon.

name: Shanghai Zhanye Exhibition Co Ltd
description: Shanghai Zhanye Exhibition Co Ltd is an organization that designs and plans events and tradeshows. This organization was established in the year 2002. It is a professional company that is known for hosting and managing several events and tradeshows and aims to develop good partnership among its clients. It understands the need and demand of the market and presents a wonderful platform with the help of which it assists the clients to enhance their marketing services and business opportunities. BWT CHINAEXPO is managed and hosted by this organization with the help of which it showcases the high quality products and equipments associated with the building water treatment technology and equipment industry. It is also known for providing the clients with comprehensive services and facilities that serves the clients and is dedicated towards their development and expansion.

name: Messe Essen GmbH
description: Fairs take place in Essen on more than 100 days a year. The MESSE ESSEN programme comprises roughly 40 fairs and exhibitions. 13 of them are international leading fairs. More than 12500 exhibitors make use of the Essen fair complex every year. Almost one in four of them comes from abroad. The exhibition area covers 110000 square metres and all 19 fair halls are directly linked to each other.This top-class fair venue has enjoyed steady development. For example turnover has doubled in the last 10 years. MESSE ESSEN is situated in the region in Germany with the strongest economy and highest population. It is central and easy to reach. Every year up to 2 million visitors come to Essen from roughly 100 countries to maintain contacts and forge new ones. MESSE ESSEN ranks among the best fair venues with the most visitors and is in the top ten in Germany.

name: Jinnoc International Expo Co., Ltd.
description: Founded in 1999 Qingdao Jinnoc Intl Expo Co. Ltd is one of the leading organizer of industrial and machinery exhibition with operations in Qingdao Shenyang Wuhan and Guangzhou in China. Focused on providing customers with valuable and professional exhibition services the company held more than a dozen regular annual professional exhibitions covering the field of machine tools industrial automation rubber tires packaging machinery environmental protection water treatment equipments etc.At Jinnoc Expo our focus is on a future of endless opportunities for our industry our customers and our employees.
